name: Grim Lavamancer
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: {R}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Grim Lavamancer deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text: "Fools dig for water, corpses, or gold. The earth's real treasure is far deeper."

name: Jackal Pup
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: Whenever Jackal Pup is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you.
flavor_text: The first morning after acquiring her familiar, the wizard awoke with fleabites and mange.

name: Mogg Fanatic
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: Mogg Fanatic deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text: "I got it! I got it! I—"

name: Spark Elemental
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: Trample, haste (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker. This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Elemental.
flavor_text: Vulshok shamans could never keep them alive for more than a few seconds, yet those few seconds seemed to be enough.

name: Figure of Destiny
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: {R/W}: Figure of Destiny becomes a Kithkin Spirit with base power and toughness 2/2.
{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}: If Figure of Destiny is a Spirit, it becomes a Kithkin Spirit Warrior with base power and toughness 4/4.
{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}: If Figure of Destiny is a Warrior, it becomes a Kithkin Spirit Warrior Avatar with base power and toughness 8/8, flying, and first strike.

name: Hellspark Elemental
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: Trample, haste
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Hellspark Elemental.

Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Keldon Marauders
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: Vanishing 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
When Keldon Marauders enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target player.

name: Mogg Flunkies
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.
flavor_text: They'll attack whatever's in front of them—as long as you tell them where that is.

name: Cinder Pyromancer
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: {T}: Cinder Pyromancer deals 1 damage to target player.
Whenever you cast a red spell, you may untap Cinder Pyromancer.
flavor_text: "If the whole world burns, I'll never grow cold."

name: Jaya Ballard, Task Mage
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Destroy target blue permanent.
{1}{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Jaya Ballard, Task Mage deals 3 damage to target creature or player. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.
{5}{R}{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Jaya Ballard deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

name: Vulshok Sorcerer
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: Haste
{T}: Vulshok Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text: Vulshok sorcerers train by leaping into electrified storm clouds. Dead or alive, they come back down with smiles on their faces.

name: Ball Lightning
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.

name: Boggart Ram-Gang
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: Haste
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
flavor_text:
"We're going to need a bigger gate."
—Bowen, Barrenton guardcaptain

name: Keldon Champion
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: Haste
Echo {2}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Keldon Champion enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target player.

name: Fire Servant
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: If a red instant or sorcery spell you control would deal damage, it deals double that damage instead.
flavor_text:
"Elemental fire shimmers with rose hues and, unlike terrestrial blazes, smolders long after it's extinguished."
—Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

name: Chain Lightning
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: Chain Lightning deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Then that player or that creature's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, he or she may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

name: Lightning Bolt
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

name: Price of Progress
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: Price of Progress deals damage to each player equal to twice the number of nonbasic lands that player controls.
flavor_text: Man versus nature is not a fair fight.

name: Thunderbolt
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Thunderbolt deals 3 damage to target player.
• Thunderbolt deals 4 damage to target creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"Most wizards consider a thunderbolt to be a proper retort."
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Reverberate
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor_text:
"I'm not indecisive. I just don't like to limit my options."
—Maxti, pyromancer

name: Browbeat
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to him or her. If no one does, target player draws three cards.
flavor_text:
"Even the threat of power has power."
—Jeska, warrior adept

name: Flames of the Blood Hand
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: Flames of the Blood Hand deals 4 damage to target player. The damage can't be prevented. If that player would gain life this turn, that player gains no life instead.
flavor_text: Many ogres extracted blood oaths from the oni they summoned. Others simply extracted blood.

name: Hammer of Bogardan
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: Hammer of Bogardan deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
{2}{R}{R}{R}: Return Hammer of Bogardan from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

name: Pillage
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or land. It can't be regenerated.

name: Sudden Impact
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: Sudden Impact deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.
flavor_text:
"Some say it's better to think before you act. While those people are considering all the options, that's usually when I kill them."
—Dravus, lava mage

name: Fireblast
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay Fireblast's mana cost.
Fireblast deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text: Embermages aren't well known for their diplomatic skills.

name: Fireball
set_name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
oracle_text: Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players.
Fireball costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
